Notes: Main MCU; 3.3 V logic. e.g. ESP32-WROOM-32. See parts_compatibility.md.
One per finger. 6 V or 12 V; match driver current (e.g. <1.2 A per ch for TB6612).
TB6612 (2 ch each) or 5× single-channel. PWM input; logic 2.7–5.5 V; motor 4.5–12 V. See parts_compatibility.md.
Fingertip force. e.g. Interlink FSR-402; use 10 kΩ divider to 3.3 V → ESP32 ADC.
Voltage divider for each FSR (FSR + 10k to GND; junction to ADC).
22–24 AWG signal; heavier for motor power. Common GND.
6–12 V per driver spec. Fuse recommended. See wiring_notes.md.
M2/M3 for small hand; match CAD hole sizes.
PLA or PETG; ~500 g–1 kg. PETG preferred for joints. See hardware/stl/README.md.
